subject: Football
Concussions
Sports Medicine
Education and Schools
Interscholastic Athletics
Brain
lead_paragraph: The tone set by the N.F.L. on injuries can influence the safety of players at various levels of play, and Commissioner Roger Goodell was pressed to step up public education efforts.
snippet: The tone set by the N.F.L. on injuries can influence the safety of players at various levels of play, and Commissioner Roger Goodell was pressed to step up public education efforts.
